short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Immerse yourself in the serene beauty of nature with Sunlit Waterfall Bliss.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Brings a breathtaking scene to your new tab page, featuring a cascading waterfall set against lush greenery and towering mountains. As the golden sun rays pierce through the clouds, the tranquil sound of the waterfall seems almost audible, creating a peaceful and rejuvenating atmosphere. Each time you open a new tab, youâ€™ll be greeted with this stunning view, bringing a sense of calm and relaxation to your workspace. 
**Note: this extension may include affiliate links.
